docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail Steamship Hermann, Licut. HIGGINS, U. S. N., Commander, arrived here at 9 o'clock yesterday, after a passage from Southampton of 12 day. The Hermann left Bremen on the 21st ult., arrived at Southampton on the 23rd, and, after taking on board the mails, passengers, , finally left that port at 4 P. M., on the 26th.
docs.abstract: Address to the Electors of London

docs.lead_paragraph: GOV. KOSSUTH and suite arrived in this city yesterday afternoon, by the steamer Alida, having left Albany in the morning. He was accompanied by a Committee from the latter city. On board the steamer KOSSUTH was the guest of Capt. PATTERSON, who exerted himself to make the trip in every way agreeable. Large crowds of persons were assembled at Poughkeepsie, Hudson, Newburg, and other points on the river.
